akn:section.akn:heading: Signing and filing of records pursuant to judicial order.

akn:content.akn:p: If a person required by this chapter to sign or deliver a record to the Mayor for filing does not do so, any other person that is aggrieved may petition the Superior Court to order:

If the petitioner under subsection (a) of this section is not the limited cooperative association or foreign cooperative to which the record pertains, the petitioner shall make the association or cooperative a party to the action.
A record filed pursuant to this section is effective without being signed.
